prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that can slide on ice and loves to swim in cold waters.
Show me a cute aquatic creature with a round body and flipper-like limbs.
Imagine a friendly seal Pokemon that enjoys lounging on icebergs and playing with trainers.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a blubbery body and a cheerful disposition.
Design a water-type Pokemon that thrives in chilly ocean waters and has a distinctive whiskery face.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a seal, featuring bright blue fur and a charming smile.
Give me a Pokemon known for its playful antics and ability to slide effortlessly on icy surfaces.
